0402bada1989258ecbfdc437cb339322a1f55a97.commitMessage: YARN-2964. RM prematurely cancels tokens for jobs that submit jobs (oozie). Contributed by Jian He

a16d022ca4313a41425c8e97841c841a2d6f2f54.commitMessage: YARN-2704. Changed ResourceManager to optionally obtain tokens itself for the sake of localization and log-aggregation for long-running services. Contributed by Jian He.

512475e56f0a27bf3c3ff596184f96993bb4bef4.commitMessage:
YARN-674. Fixed ResourceManager to renew DelegationTokens on submission asynchronously to work around potential slowness in state-store. Contributed by Omkar Vinit Joshi.

0928502029ef141759008997335ea2cd836a7154.commitMessage:
YARN-530. Defined Service model strictly, implemented AbstractService for robust subclassing and migrated yarn-common services. Contributed by Steve Loughran.
YARN-117. Migrated rest of YARN to the new service model. Contributed by Steve Louhran.
MAPREDUCE-5298. Moved MapReduce services to YARN-530 stricter lifecycle. Contributed by Steve Loughran.
